statements: SELECT * FROM art_pieces WHERE artist = 'Van Gogh';
SELECT title, year FROM art_pieces WHERE auction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT artist, highest_bid FROM art_pieces WHERE starting_price > 5000.00 ORDER BY artist ASC;
SELECT * FROM art_pieces WHERE year BETWEEN 1800 AND 1900 ORDER BY year DESC, artist ASC;
SELECT artist, title, starting_price FROM art_pieces WHERE highest_bid IS NOT NULL AND starting_price < highest_bid ORDER BY starting_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM art_pieces WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY artist ASC, starting_price DESC
SELECT artist, title, MAX(starting_price) AS max_price FROM art_pieces GROUP BY artist, title HAVING COUNT(artist) > 1
SELECT artist, title, year FROM art_pieces WHERE starting_price > 1000 AND highest_bid IS NOT NULL ORDER BY artist, year DESC
SELECT artist, title, starting_price, highest_bid FROM art_pieces WHERE auction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY starting_price DESC, artist
SELECT AVG(starting_price) AS avg_price, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM art_pieces WHERE highest_bid > starting_price AND year < 2000
SELECT * FROM auction_house;
SELECT id, name FROM auction_house WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, artist, price FROM art_piece WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT name, artist FROM art_piece ORDER BY artist ASC;
SELECT * FROM auction_house WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM auction_house WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM art_piece WHERE artist='Van Gogh' AND price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, artist, price FROM art_piece WHERE price BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 AND artist LIKE 'Picasso%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT a.id, a.name AS auction_name, COUNT(ap.id) AS total_art_pieces FROM auction_house a LEFT JOIN art_piece ap ON a.id = ap.auction_id GROUP BY a.id, a.name ORDER BY total_art_pieces DESC;
SELECT a.name AS auction_name, AVG(ap.price) AS avg_price FROM auction_house a INNER JOIN art_piece ap ON a.id = ap.auction_id GROUP BY a.name HAVING AVG(ap.price) > 1500 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM auction_houses;
SELECT name, location FROM auction_houses WHERE id = 1;
SELECT artist, year_created FROM art_pieces WHERE id = 5;
SELECT bidder_name, bid_amount FROM bidding_history WHERE bid_amount > 1000;
SELECT title, artist, year_created FROM art_pieces ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM auction_houses;
SELECT name, location FROM auction_houses WHERE name='Christie''s';
SELECT artist, year_created FROM art_pieces ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT a.name AS auction_house_name, b.bidder_name, b.bid_amount FROM auction_houses a JOIN bidding_history b ON a.id = b.auction_house_id WHERE b.bid_amount > 1000;
SELECT title, artist, bid_timestamp FROM art_pieces JOIN bidding_history ON art_pieces.id = bidding_history.art_piece_id WHERE bid_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY bid_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM ArtPieces;
SELECT id, artist_name, art_title FROM ArtPieces WHERE year_created > 2000;
SELECT art_title, estimated_value FROM ArtPieces ORDER BY estimated_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM AuctionHouses WHERE established_year < 1990;
SELECT name, location FROM AuctionHouses WHERE name LIKE 'Sotheby%';
SELECT * FROM ArtPieces WHERE year_created < 2000;
SELECT art_title, estimated_value FROM ArtPieces WHERE estimated_value > 10000 ORDER BY estimated_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Bids WHERE bid_time >= '2022-01-01' AND bid_amount > 5000;
SELECT artist_name, art_title, year_created FROM ArtPieces WHERE artist_name LIKE 'Leonardo%';
SELECT name, location, COUNT(*) AS total_bids FROM AuctionHouses JOIN Bids ON AuctionHouses.id = Bids.auction_id GROUP BY name, location ORDER BY total_bids DESC;
SELECT * FROM ArtPieces;
SELECT art_title, artist_name FROM ArtPieces ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT id, starting_price FROM ArtPieces WHERE starting_price > 5000;
SELECT house_name, location FROM AuctionHouses WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT bidder_name, email FROM Bidders WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM ArtPieces;
SELECT artist_name, art_title FROM ArtPieces WHERE year_created > 2000 ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT art_title, starting_price FROM ArtPieces WHERE starting_price >= 1000 ORDER BY starting_price DESC;
SELECT bidder_name, email FROM Bidders WHERE id IN (SELECT bidder_id FROM Bids WHERE bid_amount > 500);
SELECT house_name, location FROM AuctionHouses JOIN Auctions ON AuctionHouses.id = Auctions.house_id;
